page.title: 02VILLAGE CHURCHES
page.content: The{Anglican churches}in the area comprise a group of 7 parishes known as{"The Swan Group".}The Anglican church in Marsh Gibbon is{St.Marys,} parts of which date from the 13th century.Edgcott also has an Anglican church situated just outside the block. The Swan Group is covered by 2 vicars and a lay reader. { {The United Reformed Church}in Marsh Gibbon is a modern building built by its members in 1977 although the Church has been active for 156 years. There is also a small United Reformed Church in Charndon. The U.R.C. produce a broadsheet called{"The Link"}covering church matters and distributed to members. The Swan Group produce a similar sheet called{"Life Together "}which goes to every household and covers other village activities.
